document.heading: Closing of Public Streets Adjacent to Square 1048-S (S.O. 09-11792) Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-198, the “Closing of Public Streets Adjacent to Square 1048-S (S.O. 09-11792) Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-694, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 20, 2010, and May 4, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 19, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-410 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-198 became effective on July 23, 2010.
